name: saturation - to replace by L0_thresholds
Comment: Too many pixels above an empirically defined threshold

name: nonlinearity
Comment: I think this one is not used?

name: bad_pointing
Comment: Pan/tilt angle versus requested angle - Not yet implemented

name: placeholder1
Comment: Placeholder for other potential calibration related quality flags

name: outliers
Comment: Scan masked if the spectrally integrated signal is more than 3 sigma/25% (whichever is largest) - process is repeated until convergance

name: lu_eq_missing
Description: missing azimuthal equivalent for upwelling radiance

name: fresnel_angle_missing
Description: no appropriate fresnel angle for downwelling radiance

name: fresnel_default
Description: Default/Fixed fresnel reflectance/fresnel angles out of range for Mobleys look up table

name: min_nbred
Description: Min number of Ed required for averaging
Comment: Minimum number of valid scans (Nbred) from processing config

name: min_nbrlu
Description: Min number of Lt required for averaging
Comment: Minimum number of valid scans (Nrblu) from processing config

name: min_nbrlsky
Description: Min number of Lsky required for averaging
Comment: Minimum number of valid scans (Nbrlsky) from processing config

name: def_wind_flag
Description: Default wind value for fresnel retrieval
Comment: Default value taken from processing config

name: simil_fail
Comment: Reference wavelength from processing config and LUT from Ruddick et al. (2006).
